title: I Spy Fantasy Kids' Video Game
description: One of the best kids' games you can find on the market. Totally appropriate content for kids aged 4-9. Beautiful hand-drawn backgrounds, with a poem listing small hidden objects that the kids have to find amid the backdrop. Finding these objects guides the player through various nicely rendered stories which include launching a rocket ship, find a mermaid's treasure, or saving a princess locked up in a castle. Kids do not need to know how to read, since clicking on a poem or parts of it causes it to be read out loud (and hence also helps reading skills). A heartwarming and inspired work from the golden age of 2D.
